= Introduction =

fdplugins is a project containing a collection of various [http://www.flashdevelop.org FlashDevelop] plugins.


= Details =

This is the complete list of available plugins you can find here:

 * ~~QuickFind~~ ^(implemented in FD3 as built-in)^
 * ~~TaskList~~  ^(implemented in FD3 as built-in)^
 * BookmarkPanel
 * AsClassWizard
 * FlashApi
 * SourceOptions
 * StickiesNotes 
 * CodeReformatter
 * RegularExpressionPanel
 
Please use the plugin specific wiki page to report issues or comments.
